item_prototype.name: Connections created per minute in {#NAME}
item_prototype.description: Connection creation rate in this data source.

item_prototype.name: Connections currently existing in {#NAME}
item_prototype.description: Currently existing connections in this data source.

item_prototype.name: Connections currently in use in {#NAME}
item_prototype.description: Currently in use connections in this data source.

item_prototype.name: Connections destroyed per minute in {#NAME}
item_prototype.description: Connection destruction rate in this data source.

item_prototype.name: Connections maximum allowed in {#NAME}
item_prototype.description: Maximum allowed connections in this data source.

item_prototype.name: Connections minimum allowed in {#NAME}
item_prototype.description: Minimum allowed connections in this data source.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template JMX JBoss AS 6:jmx["{#JMXDOMAIN}:service={#SERVICE},name={#NAME}",MaxSize].last()}>=0 and {Template JMX JBoss AS 6:jmx["{#JMXDOMAIN}:service={#SERVICE},name={#NAME}",InUseConnectionCount].last()}>{Template JMX JBoss AS 6:jmx["{#JMXDOMAIN}:service={#SERVICE},name={#NAME}",MaxSize].last()}*0.8
trigger_prototype.name: Connections in use exceeds 80% of maximum allowed in {#NAME} on {HOST.NAME}

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template JMX JBoss AS 6:jmx["{#JMXDOMAIN}:service={#SERVICE},name={#NAME}",MaxSize].last()}>=0 and {Template JMX JBoss AS 6:jmx["{#JMXDOMAIN}:service={#SERVICE},name={#NAME}",InUseConnectionCount].last()}>={Template JMX JBoss AS 6:jmx["{#JMXDOMAIN}:service={#SERVICE},name={#NAME}",MaxSize].last()}
trigger_prototype.name: Connections in use reaches maximum allowed in {#NAME} on {HOST.NAME}
Connections maximum allowed is unlimited in {#NAME} on {HOST.NAME}

discovery_rule.name: JBoss threads thread pools discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discover JBoss threads for Thread Pools.

item_prototype.name: Rejections per minute in {#NAME}
item_prototype.description: Request rejection ratio in this pool.

item_prototype.name: Threads currently in {#NAME}
item_prototype.description: Threads currently existing and, possibly, busy in this pool.

item_prototype.name: Threads maximum allowed in {#NAME}
item_prototype.description: Maximum threads allowed to handle requests in this pool.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template JMX JBoss AS 6:jmx["{#JMXDOMAIN}:type={#TYPE},name={#NAME}",MaxThreads].last()}>=0 and {Template JMX JBoss AS 6:jmx["{#JMXDOMAIN}:type={#TYPE},name={#NAME}",CurrentThreadCount].last()}>{Template JMX JBoss AS 6:jmx["{#JMXDOMAIN}:type={#TYPE},name={#NAME}",MaxThreads].last()}*0.8
trigger_prototype.name: Threads exceeds 80% of maximum allowed in {#NAME} on {HOST.NAME}
Threads maximum allowed is unlimited in {#NAME} on {HOST.NAME}

discovery_rule.name: JBoss web managers discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discover JBoss web managers for different application contexts.

item_prototype.name: Sessions active on {#HOST}{#PATH}
item_prototype.description: Number of active sessions at this moment

item_prototype.name: Sessions created per minute on {#HOST}{#PATH}
item_prototype.description: Number of sessions created per minute by this manager

item_prototype.name: Sessions expired per minute on {#HOST}{#PATH}
item_prototype.description: Number of sessions expired per minute by this manager

item_prototype.name: Sessions maximum active allowed on {#HOST}{#PATH}
item_prototype.description: The maximum number of active sessions allowed, or -1 for no limit

item_prototype.name: Sessions maximum active so far on {#HOST}{#PATH}
item_prototype.description: Maximum number of active sessions so far

item_prototype.name: Sessions rejected per minute on {#HOST}{#PATH}
item_prototype.description: Number of sessions rejected per minute by this manager due to maxActive being reached

trigger_prototype.name: Session creation rate exceeds 100 per minute on {#HOST}{#PATH} on {HOST.NAME}

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template JMX JBoss AS 6:jmx["{#JMXDOMAIN}:type={#TYPE},host={#HOST},path={#PATH}",maxActiveSessions].last()}>=0 and {Template JMX JBoss AS 6:jmx["{#JMXDOMAIN}:type={#TYPE},host={#HOST},path={#PATH}",activeSessions].last()}>{Template JMX JBoss AS 6:jmx["{#JMXDOMAIN}:type={#TYPE},host={#HOST},path={#PATH}",maxActiveSessions].last()}*0.8
trigger_prototype.name: Sessions active exceeds 80% of maximum allowed on {#HOST}{#PATH} on {HOST.NAME}
Sessions maximum active allowed is unlimited on {#HOST}{#PATH} on {HOST.NAME}

discovery_rule.name: JBoss web request processors discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discover JBoss web Global Request Processors for different connectors.

item_prototype.name: Errors per second on {#NAME}
item_prototype.description: Errors rate on this web connector.

item_prototype.name: Requests average processing time (5 min avg) on {#NAME}
item_prototype.description: Average request processing time for the 5 minute interval on this connector.

item_prototype.name: Requests count on {#NAME}
item_prototype.description: Requests processed on this web connector.

item_prototype.name: Requests per second (5 min avg) on {#NAME}
item_prototype.description: Average request rate for the 5 minute interval on this connector.

item_prototype.name: Requests processing time on {#NAME}
item_prototype.description: Time spent to process requests on this web connector.

item_prototype.name: Traffic incoming on {#NAME}
item_prototype.description: Incoming traffic on this web connector.

item_prototype.name: Traffic outgoing on {#NAME}
item_prototype.description: Outgoing traffic on this web connector.

trigger_prototype.name: Incoming traffic exceeds 100 kbps on {#NAME} on {HOST.NAME}
Request average processing time exceeds 10 s on {#NAME} on {HOST.NAME}
Request rate exceeds 10 tps on {#NAME} on {HOST.NAME}

discovery_rule.name: JBoss web thread pools discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discover JBoss web Thread Pools for different connectors.

item_prototype.name: Threads accepting requests in {#NAME}
item_prototype.description: Acceptor threads in this pool.

item_prototype.name: Threads currently busy in {#NAME}
item_prototype.description: Threads currently busy in this pool.

item_prototype.name: Threads currently existing in {#NAME}
item_prototype.description: Threads currently busy in this pool.

item_prototype.name: Threads maximum allowed in {#NAME}
item_prototype.description: Maximum threads allowed to handle requests in this pool.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template JMX JBoss AS 6:jmx["{#JMXDOMAIN}:type={#TYPE},name={#NAME}",maxThreads].last()}>=0 and {Template JMX JBoss AS 6:jmx["{#JMXDOMAIN}:type={#TYPE},name={#NAME}",currentThreadsBusy].last()}>{Template JMX JBoss AS 6:jmx["{#JMXDOMAIN}:type={#TYPE},name={#NAME}",maxThreads].last()}*0.8
trigger_prototype.name: Threads busy exceeds 80% of maximum allowed in {#NAME} on {HOST.NAME}
Threads maximum allowed is unlimited in {#NAME} on {HOST.NAME}
